attributes.action: stop vat charges on fun based exercise
attributes.additional_details:
The goverment are telling us they are concerned about childhood abesity that it is a major concern and we need to act now , yet they charge vat on children's activities such as horse riding, soft play centres, sking, ice skating . These and nany others i consider exercise based play.  I want to see vat on these types of activities abolished making these activities more affordable and therefore more accessible
Please add your support to this petition let's see the goverment support childhood abesity in a real way
